item.title: The DuCross Bros: Episode 109
item.description: The DuCross Brothers. Major League Baseball has their most valuable players. UFC 91 crowns the next big thing.Grid Iron talk titans heading to perfectville, Monday night fall out, Chargers running out of time. Is their ties in the NFL and more.MLB around the diamond Peavy the dictator, yanks trying to buy pitching. Dodgers say nah I m good. Cross Fire People lose 64 million on the chargersSteeler game.how should nfl handle this.Should sport leagues look into players health, like heart defects or anything else for that matter.Shaq says it was all Phil Jacksons fault .NCAA College Football talk.ESPN gets the BCS, Michigan get a life, New Duck Uniforms.NHL Center Ice. Melrose caned, Tocchet takes over but suffers the same fate.Other news and notes.Mark Cuban caught insider trading. 16 Yr Old girl gets drafted to pitch in Japan.

item.title: The DuCross Bros: Episode 108
item.description: the nu breed of sports internet talk radio, its like your local talk at a bar, or your debate with your friends. This is The DuCross Brothers, November 11 its 4 pm pst, 7 pm est. Fall out of the Monday night game raises some questions..Grid Iron talk titans roll on, Chargers break their losing streak, more on the raiders dysfunctional state, Shockey gets the shock treatment and other notes. MLB around the diamond manny gets offered manny money but is it enough, MLB Awards handed out, just before the Holliday season the Oakland A gets a gift. More on the Peavy trade rumors.Cross Fire NFL Hires FBI agents to spy on players NCAA College Football talk.Saban Bowl 2, Penn St falls while texas tech holds on. NHL Center Ice.Bettman speaks on headshot, Messier dips in to, second team maybe coming to a city near you. NBA Hardwood Talk, Youngest poker player to win, former football player bites off a officers finger tip

item.title: The DuCross Bros: Episode 105
item.description: October 21st 4pm pst, 7pm est Your listening to The DuCross Brothers with Your hosts Tristen and Shaun DuCross. Elite XC out of business, One vick gets good news the other gets bad news.Wow what a grid iron segment we have, Chargers derailed, Im an FN Soljer winslow suspended, Pro Bowl safety takes a shot at the NFL and former NFL linemen backs him. And more. NCAA College Football longhorns and bama tops the rankings, LSU hangs tough while others fall.Cross Fire We went to see the Anaheim ducks game our thoughts.Center Ice is back baby, Montreal Canadians attempting to make history, ducks stalling, New head coach in Chicago, Lighting may strike soon, two teams in Toronto.Hardwood talk shaq calls out san Antonio, kobe offered a villa and a yaught while Jose Canseco is not trying to smuggle drugs into the US is sorry.

item.title: The DuCross Bros: Episode 104
item.description: The DuCross Brothers with Your hosts Tristen and Shaun DuCross. Adam Jones benched, NFL Trade Deadline over.On the diamond teams on the brink, a blackout world series, Canseco gets caught, a former master of disguise thinks about coming back to the us.Grid Iron talk, the San Diego super chargers arrive.Cowboys dismantled, Red skins add a pro bowler, Harrison still under fire, and more.Cross Fire Is it ok at a high school level to put up 91pts in a football game or sports for that matter. BCS rankings are out and a new number 1 is named, the saviour down in the swamp takes out the tigers, the sooners fall, and more upsets. One school puts up a website to get rid of their coach.SLAM BALL IS BACK, Two brothers to square off against each other in mixed martial arts, NHL Season is here and the first suspension on the season, NBA Hardwood has Monte Ellis laid out

item.title: The Hot Spot Show Live: Episode 84
item.description: NFL Owners saying its over.. Then its around the diamond padres fizzling out, fans not happy and either is Towers, one of the greatest catchers in the game calls it a career and a HOF pitcher to follow to, Instant replay yes or no and more. We also have NFL Gridiron talk Matt Ryan says for a ridiculously amount of money, Marion Barber gets hooked up, Cowboys Roy Williams to be released, NFL Future looks grim. Thats the first hour folks its packed to start the second hour of this Hot Spot we heat up with the NBA playoffs final 4 set is it time for the clover leafs to fall from the sky, Draft Lottery has who at the helm for the nets, Melo to have a new home, Center Ice baby the Stanley Cup is here the teams are set, this is where legends are born, kids become men. Its on. Yes folks its hot people care Big Brown on his quest for the first triple crown in 30 yrs, Elite XC May 31st 14yr old boy injured playing baseball people call for change.

item.title: The Hot Spot Show Live: Episode 82
item.description: This dawns a new era in our show The Hot Spot. This is our debut here with Ubroadcast and part of this new sports channel. Thanks goes out to everyone involved. We are on sports channel 100. First up, allow me to introduce us. For the people that knows us and have followed us, you know whats up but, for those people that dont. My name is Tristen and my brothers name is Shaun, we host this show. Many people may think.The Hot Spot isnt a sports talk show. Well, yes it is, we named it that because at the time,we were hitting on all the top headlines in the sports world and we thought The Hot Spot Fit that mold. Anyways..enough rambling todays show is packed for two hoursKobe Bryant wins MVP Award. Chris Benson gets caught, NBA Hardwood talk, NBA Playoffs are hot, Hornets take an early 2 zero lead, Controversy at the palace, more talk on the playoffs, Bulls get their coach. Center Ice has us at the point Dallas Stars Vs Sharks make history and possibly the best hockey game in years. Canadians eliminated, On to the Diamond has Ozzie Guillen at a breaking point, Tigers Padres changes coming, Clemens life story unfolds, strippers, bartenders, Grid Iron seasons coming, Marvin Harrison latest update, Jake Long, Jacob Hester impressing their teams early, Shaun Alexander to make a tour, then to head on out we will finish our show with talks about Cowboys, HBO close to signing a deal, Oscar De La Hoya to get a what in front of the staples center, Sportsman ship shown in womens softball, and girl beats out 15 guys to get a spot on her high school baseball team
item.author: thehotspotshow@hotmail.com (The DuCross Brothers)

item.title: The Hot Spot: Episode 1
item.description: On our first podcast we will talk about the insane run that the San Diego Padres have put together in the month of MAY, also touch on the NHL playoffs, we will also talk about the NBA Playoffs as well as the Los Angeles Clippers lasting longer then the Los Angeles Lakers. Also touch on two prolific Major League Baseball faces that are chasing records. We will touch on the San Diego Chargers off season and close it out with NASCAR only room for one bad guy and one son of a legend.
